summary: An ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Blewett Street from Ashworth Avenue to the right-of-way of the Northern Pacific Railway Co. et al. in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete walks etc. under Ordinance 16877 creating Local Improvement District No. 1583, prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvements.
